oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dia!kwain comments on George Stow's copy of a Bushman painting (no. 1) which features figures and various animals (numbered). He describes the doings of the |xam with regard to hunting. Dia!kwain goes on to describe the habits of the hunting leopard.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Explanation of Mr G. Stow's pictures: 1 (habits of the hunting leopard)
